name: Muhammad Shayan Nazeer

education.institution: National University of Sciences and Technology (NUST)
education.focus_area: Embedded systems, Hardware Security, wireless communication

final_year_project.title: Extensive Python library for implementing state-of-the-art logic locking techniques
final_year_project.description: Empowering users to implement hardware security techniques on verilog hardware designs effortlessly.

achievements: Developed a distributed 5G core testbed on the POWDER platform by the University of Utah.
Separated user and control planes within the testbed for enhanced experimentation and comprehensive insights.
Testing developed testbed under various test cases by deploying simulated UEs (User Equipment) to evaluate distributed 5G core.

experience.project_title: A Brain-Computer Interface (BCI) Enabled Motion Intent Recognition System for Assistive Robotics
achievements: Won a research grant of PKR 1 million for the project from my university.
Trained and developed an EEG classifier using parallel CNNs and RNNs to predict the intention of left, right, up, and down movements with the accuracy of 89%.
Integrated a robotic arm to be controlled using prediction from EEG classifier.
Designed and developed various home automation devices including smart switches and automated lights.
Prototyped complete working system for IoT-enabled electronic door lock.
Developed a specialized PCB for each device using Altium Designer.
Integrated smart home devices with AWS IoT core to allow for connectivity through smartphones over the internet.
